Eric Desmond.Action: Strives stubbornly forward through heavy snow, gale winds, and sub-zero temperatures despite being out of place and ill-equipped.
Tries to follow predator footprints in snow but loses the trail as footprints fade under snow and wind.

Refuses to hand over his prisoner despite threats and intimidation.

Refuses to hand over his prisoner despite pressure and threats, demonstrating confidence and control over the situation.
